channel.title: NCAA on Jared DeHaan's Github Site
channel.description: Recent content in NCAA on Jared DeHaan's Github Site

item.title: Is Kofi Cockburn ready for the NBA or should he go back to Illinois for one more season?
item.description: Illinois had a terrific season thanks to future first round pick Ayo Dosunmu and Kofi Cockburn. Yes, I know this name sounds very funny but itâ€™s pronounced like Coburn with no c and k.

item.title: Who was the worst offensive college basketball team this season?
item.description: The constant questions you see are who is the best team in a particular season or who is the best player or players. I want to do a different spin and see who is the worst team(s) in the 2020-2021 NCAA basketball season on the offensive side of the ball. This Covid stricken season has been very odd and many teams had difficulty playing all their games due to cancellations and postponements.
